title: Letrozole, abemaciclib and metformin in endometrial cancer: a non-randomized phase 2 trial
description: Combined hormonal therapy and CDK4/6 inhibition face resistance challenges in endometrial cancer. Here, the authors present a phase 2, one-arm clinical trial, where metformin is combined with letrozole (hormonal therapy) and abemaciclib (a CDK4/6 inhibitor) r…
content:
• Green, A. et al. A phase II study of fulvestrant and abemaciclib in hormone receptor positive advanced or recurrent endometrial cancer. J. Clin. Oncol.42, 55115511 (2024). Google Scholar
